 CREATE FUNCTION util.modulesGetDescriptionFromComments(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
 RETURNS TABLE
 AS
 RETURN(
-	SELECT
-		object_id objectId,
-		TRIM(REPLACE(s.value, 'Description:', '')) description
-	FROM sys.sql_modules
-		CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(REPLACE(definition, '--', CHAR(31)), CHAR(31)) s

-		AND s.value LIKE '%Description:	%'
+SELECT
+	lnCreate.object_id objectId,
+	TRIM(REPLACE(lnDescr.line, '-- Description:', '')) description,
+	lnDescr.ordinal lineNumber
+FROM util.modulesSplitToLines(DEFAULT, DEFAULT) lnDescr
+	CROSS APPLY(
+		SELECT lnCreate.object_id, lnCreate.ordinal 
+		FROM util.modulesSplitToLines(lnDescr.object_id, DEFAULT) lnCreate 
+		WHERE lnCreate.line LIKE 'CREATE%'
+) lnCreate
+WHERE
+	lnDescr.line LIKE '%-- Description:%' AND lnCreate.ordinal > lnDescr.ordinal
 );
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
CREATE FUNCTION modulesGetDescriptionFromComments(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN(
	SELECT
		CONCAT(QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(object_id)), '.', QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(object_id))) objectName,
		TRIM(REPLACE(s.value, 'Description:', '')) description
	FROM sys.sql_modules
		CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(REPLACE(definition, '--', CHAR(31)), CHAR(31)) s
	WHERE
		(@object IS NULL OR object_id = CONVERT(INT, @object) OR OBJECT_NAME(object_id) = @object)
		AND definition LIKE '%-- Description:	%'
		AND s.value LIKE '%Description:	%'
);-- Write your own SQL object definition here, and it'll be included in your package.
